## Tender Description
The Laboratory Centre for Disease Control (LCDC) building requires the replacement of its block 4 perimeter hydronic heating system due to critical piping failures resulting from the system reaching its end of service life expectancy. The project aims to replace the full system to meet current and modern operational standards.
**MANDATORY** site visit on November 30, 2023, at 10:00 am. Interested bidders must meet at the Lobby of LCDC, 100 Eglantine Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K9. Bids submitted by bidders who have not signed the attendance sheet will not be accepted. Please email René Beauchamp to confirm attendance.

- Contractor list

Please be sure to review the documentation thoroughly to ensure compliance with the bid requirements. This is a professional Corp writing style. Thanks!
